text:
Created attachment 31176
Adds application/ld+json to mime.types

JSON-LD's media type has been registered at IANA already quite some time ago and the specification at W3C already reached Proposed Recommendation status. It is expected to become a proper Recommendation next week. Given that it is already used in the wild, I think it would be time to add its media type to mime.types. I've added a patch for trunk but this should also be backported to 2.4. Let me know if you want me to either create a separate ticket for that or add another patch.

Thanks,
Markus
creator: mark_lanthaler@gmx.net
